text: Luca Anthony Hoole (born 2 June 2002) is a Welsh professional footballer who plays as a right back and midfielder for Bristol Rovers. ==Club career== Hoole attended Ysgol Gyfun Gwynllyw, a Welsh language school in Pontypool. In 2014, Hoole joined the Bristol Rovers academy. In April 2018, Bristol Rovers confirmed Hoole had signed a scholarship with the club.
